title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Valles Caldera National Preserve Ranger Talk      Time: 2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Valle Grande Visitor Center (39201 NM Highway 4, Jemez Springs, NM 87025) Fees: Free, included with entrance fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Everyday  from 05/23/2016 to 10/30/2016 Join a ranger at the Valle Grande Visitor Center for a short talk to learn about various topics related to the Valles Caldera National Preserve.  View Details      Valles Caldera National Preserve Elk Tour      Time: 5:30 PM to 7:30 PM Location: Valle Grande Visitor Center (39201 NM Highway 4, Jemez Springs, NM 87025) Fees: Free, included with entrance fee     Friday, August 12, 2016 Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/15/2016 to 09/30/2016 Join a ranger for a two-hour van tour highlighting the Valles Caldera National Preserve's favorite residents, the elk. View Details      Valles Caldera National Preserve Fly Fishing clinic - Youth & Adult      Location: Valle Grande Visitor Center Fees: Free, included with entrance fee     Saturday, August 20, 2016 New Mexico Trout volunteers host a fly fishing clinic for youth and adults. Parent and child pairings are welcome.  View Details      Valles Caldera National Preserve National Parks BioBlitz - Valles Caldera      Time: 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Valle Grande Visitor Center (39201 NM Highway 4, Jemez Springs, NM 87025) Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 The 2016 NPS BioBlitz at Valles Caldera will explore the natural history of organisms in all taxonomic groups in streams/wetlands, upland grasslands, and forests. We need your help in building a photo library of all taxonomic species. View Details
